details.registry: Implemented ToolkitEntry class and ToolkitRegistry for registering tools with metadata
details.tool.run: Implemented execution environment with logging, error handling, and reflection generation
details.design_ui: Implemented 5 tools: logo.generate, brand.palette.suggest, css.style.generate, ui.component.scaffold, responsive.layout.create
details.media_content: Implemented 4 tools: video.intro.generate, product.demo.script, audio.voiceover.write, animation.describe
details.dev_testing: Implemented 7 tools: code.read, code.comment, unit.test.generate, unit.test.run, debug.trace, api.build, db.schema.generate
details.marketing_growth: Implemented 6 tools: copy.email.campaign, content.blog.generate, social.calendar.create, meme.generate, copy.tagline, landing.hero.write
details.operations_security: Implemented 6 tools: env.secret.check, agent.self.check, guardian.escalate, tool.timeout.limit, task.finish.check, agent.escalate.reason
details.toolkit_reflections: Implemented reflection logging logic for tools with requires_reflection=true
